original_title: Kiss Me, Lick Me, Fuck Me
overview: Beautiful director/slut Bobbi Starr gives a personal, kinky touch to whatever she does, both in front of and behind the camera. And the stunning brunette has a particular way with women! In her deluxe double-disc, twelve-girl release Kiss Me, Lick Me, Fuck Me, Bobbi brings that relentlessly honest style of reality-based sex to a fresh array of intense, intimate lesbian hook-ups.
title: Kiss Me, Lick Me, Fuck Me
